Name: Chase
About the game: Chase is an arcade racing game. You control the spacecraft following the creek of the river on some unknown planet. You are chased by enemies who want to destroy you. Your spacecraft has limited health and each collision with creek walls damages spacecraft. The goal is to reach finish and stay alive. - Ultra fast and intense gameplay - Hours of action filled gameplay across six different levels - Spectacular sound tracks - Integrated Leaderboards
